00082 joLight::joLight() : Iop() 
00083 {
00085         inputs( 2 );
00087         phi = 0.0f;
00088         theta = 0.0f;
00089         isPoint = false;
00090         intensity = 1.0f;
00091         posX = 0.0f;
00092         posY = 0.0f;
00093         posZ = 0.0f;
00094         colorR = 1.0f;
00095         colorG = 1.0f;
00096         colorB = 1.0f;
00097         attenuateMe = true;
00098         doSpec = false;
00099         roughness = 150.0f;

00104 void joLight::knobs(Knob_Callback f) 
00105 {
00106         Bool_knob( f, &isPoint, "pointLight" );
00107 
00108         Text_knob( f, "Directional Light Attributes\n");
00109         Float_knob( f, &phi, IRange( 0,2 * M_PI, false ), "phi" );
00110         Float_knob( f, &theta, IRange( -M_PI,M_PI, false ), "theta" );
00111         
00112         Text_knob( f, "Point Light Attributes\n");
00113         Float_knob( f, &posX, IRange( -10.0f, 10.0f, false ), "posX" );
00114         Float_knob( f, &posY, IRange( -10.0f, 10.0f, false ), "posY" );
00115         Float_knob( f, &posZ, IRange( -10.0f, 10.0f, false ), "posZ" );
00116         
00117         Text_knob( f, "General Light Attributes\n");
00118         Float_knob( f, &intensity, IRange( 0,2, false ), "intensity" );
00119         Bool_knob( f, &attenuateMe, "attenuate" );
00120         Float_knob( f, &colorR, IRange( 0, 1.0f, false ), "colorR" );
00121         Float_knob( f, &colorG, IRange( 0, 1.0f, false ), "colorG" );
00122         Float_knob( f, &colorB, IRange( 0, 1.0f, false ), "colorB" );
00123         
00124         Text_knob( f, "Specular Shading Attributes\n");
00125         Bool_knob( f, &doSpec, "specular" );
00126         Float_knob( f, &roughness, IRange( 0, 300.0f, false ), "roughness" );
00127 
00128         Bool_knob( f, &lightVectors, "Output just the light Vectors" );
00129         File_knob( f, &filename, "outFile" );
00130 
00131         Script_knob( f, "exportLight", "Write File" );
00132 }

00142 void joLight::_validate(bool for_real)
00143 {
00144         copy_info();
00145         input1().validate( for_real );
00146 
00147         if ( intensity <= 0 || info_.is_constant()) 
00148         {
00149                 set_out_channels(Mask_None);
00150                 return;
00151         }
00152 
00153         if ( isPoint && posX == 0 && posY == 0 && posZ == 0 ) 
00154         {
00155                 set_out_channels(Mask_None);
00156                 return;
00157         }
00158 
00159         Format test = info_.format();
00160         width = test.width();
00161         height = test.height();
00162         set_out_channels(Mask_All);
00163         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r()+1, info_.t()+1 );
00164 }

00166 void joLight::_request(int x,int y,int r,int t, ChannelMask channels, int count)
00167 {
00168         input0().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00169         input1().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00170 }
00171 
00172 void joLight::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00173 {
00175         out.range(0,width);
00177         Row in1(x, r);
00178         Row in2(x, r);
00179 
00180         input0().get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00181         input1().get(y, x, r, channels, in2);
00183         foreach (z, channels) 
00184         {
00186                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable( Chan_Red );
00187                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable( Chan_Green );
00188                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable( Chan_Blue);
00190                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ ) 
00191                 {
00193                         Vector N( in1[Chan_Red][index], in1[Chan_Green][index],in1[Chan_Blue][index] );
00194                         Vector I( in2[Chan_Red][index], in2[Chan_Green][index],in2[Chan_Blue][index] );
00195                         Vector L;
00196                         
00198                         if ( I.length() > 0.0001 )
00199                         {
00200                 
00202                                 if ( !isPoint )
00203                                 {
00205                                         attenuateMe = false;
00206                                         float tempX = sin( theta ) * cos( phi );
00207                                         float tempY = sin( phi );
00208                                         float tempZ = cos( phi ) * cos( theta );
00209                                         L.setVector( tempX, tempY, tempZ );
00210                                 } else
00211                                 {
00214                                         L.setVector( posX - I.x, posY - I.y, posZ - I.z );
00215                                 }
00216 
00217                                 float distFac = 1.0f;
00218                                 float specAmount = 0;
00220                                 if ( attenuateMe )
00221                                 {
00223                                         distFac = 1 / ( L.length() * L.length() ) ;
00224                                 }
00226                                 L.normalize();
00227                                 I.normalize();
00229                                 if ( doSpec )
00230                                 {
00232                                         Vector R = L.reflection( N );
00233                                         R.normalize();
00235                                         if ( N.dot( L ) > 0 )
00236                                         {
00238                                                 specAmount = pow( I.dot( R ), roughness );
00239                                         }
00240                                 }
00242                                 float diffuse = L.dot( N );
00244                                 if( lightVectors )
00245                                 {
00246                                                 outPixelsR[index] = L.x* distFac;
00247                                                 outPixelsG[index] = L.y* distFac;
00248                                                 outPixelsB[index] = L.z* distFac;
00249 
00250                                 } else
00251                                 {
00253                                         outPixelsR[index] = diffuse * colorR * intensity * distFac + specAmount;
00254                                         outPixelsG[index] = diffuse * colorG * intensity * distFac + specAmount;
00255                                         outPixelsB[index] = diffuse * colorB * intensity * distFac + specAmount;
00256                                 }
00257                         } else
00258                         {
00259                                 outPixelsR[index] = 0.0f;
00260                                 outPixelsG[index] = 0.0f;
00261                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00262                         }
00263                 } 
00264                 
00265         }
00266 }
